project_descr: This project aims at ensuring that environment and climate change are mainstreamed in most economically important and vulnerable sectors of the economy in Tanzania leading to poverty reduced levels while maintaining environmental integrity.

outputs.output_descr: LECB is a country-driven initiative that promotes cooperation between relevant institutions, engaging the public sector and industry in an effort to design and implement approaches to low emission development.
